contentrichtext.text: '''[[Zhang Heng]]''' was an ancient astronomer and mathematician. '''Zhang Heng''' may also refer to: *[[Zhang Heng (Water Margin)]], one of the 108 heroes in the ''Water Margin'' *[[Zhang Heng (Han Dynasty)]], military officer serving under Han Sui in the later Han Dynasty *[[1802 Zhang Heng]], an asteroid named after the astronomer *[[Zhang Heng (Taoist)]], one of the leaders during the [[Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion]] *[[Zhang Heng (rugby player)]], rugby player who [[Rugby sevens at the 2006 Asian Games#Medal Winners|won a medal in rugby sevens at the 2006 Asian Games]] ==See also== *[[Chang Heng (crater)]], a lunar crater named after him {{Disambig}} [[Category:Human name disambiguation pages]]
